snippet: The Brooklyn district attorney’s office is investigating a cellphone video that shows an officer reaching into a man’s pocket. The man says the officer took more than $1,000.
abstract: Brooklyn district attorney's office is investigating cellphone video showing NYPD officer removing more than $1,000 from pocket of Lamar Joye near a basketball court in Coney Island, Brooklyn; Joye, who was not arrested, claims that officer sprayed him with pepper spray, and that his money has not been returned.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn district attorney’s office is investigating a cellphone video that shows an officer reaching into a man’s pocket. The man says the officer took more than $1,000.

headline.main: Video of Officer Accused of Theft Prompts Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Video of Officer Accused of Theft Prompts Inquiry
